review: The patient who is 77 years old felt comfortable and satisfied with the RCT of 4 teeth in one sitting. The doctor was friendly and the process was done with care.
The overall treatment was good but it is extremely painful. The anaesthesia had to be given twice to subside the pain.
Appreciate  the clear explanation  of procedure and taking care to  make the  patient relaxed and comfortable. .
Handled well and did root canal treatment, recommend him to everyone for RCA. Not painful.
